title: Isolate $$x$$
text: To solve the equation, isolate $$x$$ by taking the square root of both sides.

title: Square Root of Negative
text: To take the square root of a negative number, separate the number into $$(-1)(8)$$.

title: Imaginary Numbers
text: The square root of $$-1$$ is i.

title: Simplify Square Root
text: To simplify $$\sqrt{8}$$, factor out a perfect square and leave the other factor inside of the square root.
